ResourceHeader.ResourceName: International Space Station, Floating Potential Measurement Unit, FPMU
ResourceHeader.Description: International Space Station, Floating Potential Measurement Unit. FPMU, The FPMU is used to correct the charging models of the station each time a new section is added to the structure. By providing feedback on the effectiveness of steps taken to control charging, the FPMU helps ensure a safe working environment for the astronauts.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: R.M. Suggs, S.L. Koontz, NASA Johnson Space Center, Contact Rob Suggs for support and use.
